Package jason.mas2j

Class MAS2JProject

java.lang.Object
jason.mas2j.MAS2JProject
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class MAS2JProject extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a MAS2J project (usually created from a .mas2j file)
